dtliExcerpt: This revival of the 1963 musical based on N. Richard Nash's play 'The Rainmaker' is a sweet-natured but dramatically inert evening that never generates the heat suggested by its title.
showScoreExcerpt: This revival of the 1963 musical based on N. Richard Nash's play 'The Rainmaker' is a sweet-natured but dramatically inert evening that never generates the heat suggested by its title.
